title: Karoon
content: Karoon river, the most affluent and longest river in Iran, has made beautiful phenomena all along its course. Shearing and eroding the formations by the river is one of such a series of phenomena. In the upstream part of Karoon I dam (Shahid Abbaspoor dam) and Paleogene Limestones, such erosions are eye-catching and scenic. Boating in the narrow water channels behind the clam while looking up at the beautiful high walls is so attractive.

gallery.caption: ER15-1 :A high wall surrounding the Karoon I dam lake
ER15-3 :Lushness of  lands surrounding the dam lake has given a beautiful natural scenery to the region
ER15-4 :One of the waterways in the surroundings of Karoon river
ER15-5 :Various limy formations shared along Karoon river course
ER15-6 :A very scenic gorge along Karoon river course
